name: Dusty And Rusty's Compleat Time Waster!
name_original: Dusty And Rusty's Compleat Time Waster!
description:
Waiting for an appointment? Standing in a long line?  Sitting around until  the in-laws get bored and go home? Then Dusty And Rusty's Compleat Time Waster is just for you!

Minutes and minutes of great physics-based shooter action. Knock down things (including Dusty and Rusty themselves) and score points!  Each episode has just so many shots and so many seconds to complete but that doesn't matter when your objective is just to pass some time... half the fun is watching the stuff bounce around on-screen!
